overview:
Tim Eby is expecting his MBA from Columbia Business School in 2011. Tim spent five years working for IBM Server Group, first as a development engineer and then transitioning to commodity management for the POWER-series microprocessor line. During Timâ€™s tenure at IBM, he was awarded an IBM Outstanding Technical Achievement award for his contribution to the design and development of a leading edge verification system. In addition, Tim has filed six patents and has received IBMâ€™s Early Tenure Inventor and Invention Plateau awards.

He’s the current VP of Product Development for Traveltrot, which solves the simple problems that tourists have while visiting a new city, with easy to use mobile applications.
